title: Jaya Bachchan says 'I am ashamed, couldn't watch the entire clip' | Manipur Video | News - Times of India Videos
selftext:
Maybe next stop for ED is Jaya Bachchan. Most channels didn’t show or mention Jaya talking about UP.

Maybe the threat of ED raid is the reason Amitabh would rather sit in the corner of his house and practice praises for Modi for when he is called upon next time…
comments:
Republic TV very conveniently removed any mention of UP from their coverage.

Amitabh must be real proud that there’s someone with real balls in the house.

Amitabh's black money was found in some leaks many years back. How can he speak!

No one even care about that today, no one even mentions it now.
